content:
请看以下示例。之后根据我发给你的代码，按示例的格式翻译：第一个引号内放原文，译文放在第二引号内。叹气等动作说明保留原文格式。译文的标点使用中文标点，避免使用英文标点。语气词运用增强角色个性。注意翻译的时候忠实原文，不得省略太多细节和过于自由发挥。
特别注意：1.逐词对应，保留所有原始词汇与表达，必须保留原文中的拟声词、语气词、人名等。2.句子长度保持，禁止省略原文中的信息。并保留原文中的结构和标点（标点1:1还原）。3.​禁忌内容零处理​：根据原文的委婉程度处理。原文直白的，翻译也直白，原文委婉的，则用委婉处理。4.禁止使用中文文言文、方言、俚语。保留原文的语境。翻译的内容请尽量全部翻译，不要中英文混杂，人名部分请看后面的人名对照表，严格对应。

# game/script.rpy:3573
translate chinese withman_sm_ed4a5e8d:

    # man "Stop trying to kiss my ass, Lucy, there may be plenty of time for that later."
    man "别急着拍我马屁，露西，以后有的是时间。"

# game/script/rpy:3577
translate chinese withman_sm_f8f98ebb:

    # "What could not shake was that if she and Lucretia were “good friends” then could she and Oswald be...? Nah, impossible...or is it?"
    "挥之不去的疑虑是：若她与露克蕾西娅是'挚友'，那她与奥斯瓦尔德是否...？不，不可能...还是说有可能？"

下面是完整的格式说明：

注释行​（用于标识文件位置和翻译ID）：
必须以 # 开头
格式为：# game/[文件名].[扩展名]:[行号]
示例：# game/exp-wos.rpy:1812
​翻译定义行​（用于关联原文和译文）：
必须以 translate 关键字开头
格式为：translate [语言代码] [翻译ID]
示例：translate chinese ressurect_eric_the_widowmaker_dde3ee86:
​译文内容​：
缩进4个空格（或1个制表符）
每行译文前不能有 # 注释符号
示例：
    nav "你现在有第二次机会去杀死罪孽吞噬者佩特拉..."
​原文内容​（可选，通常用于QA检查）：
必须缩进4个空格
必须以 # 开头
示例：
markdown
    # nav "You now have a second chance to slay Petra..."

​完整示例​：

# game/exp-wos.rpy:1812
translate chinese ressurect_eric_the_widowmaker_dde3ee86:

    # nav "You now have a second chance to slay Petra..."
    nav "你现在有第二次机会去杀死罪孽吞噬者佩特拉..."


另一种结构是以old和new写的格式：如下所示，old为英文，new为中文
如下列人名表所示：
old "Abigail"
new "阿比盖尔"

old "Hugo"
new "雨果"

old "Hazel"
new "海柔尔"

old "Carter"
new "卡特"

old "Eshana"
new "埃莎娜"

old "Jade"
new "杰德"

old "Carlos"
new "卡洛斯"

old "Veronica"
new "维罗妮卡"

old "Mike"
new "迈克"

old "Daisy"
new "黛西"

old "Asher"
new "阿什"

old "Nora"
new "诺拉"

old "Ben"
new "本"

old "Miu"
new "美羽"

old "Amber"
new "安珀"

old "Hint"
new "提示"

# game/talk.rpy:20
translate chinese talk_ver_9566fd1f:

    # ver "It's newly renovated under the new owner. It has serval rooms, but I preferred the open space out here – plenty of dancing, drinking, and fun to be had here."
	ver "It's newly renovated under the new owner. It has serval rooms, but I preferred the open space out here – plenty of dancing, drinking, and fun to be had here."

# game/talk.rpy:21
translate chinese talk_ver_23409465:

    # haz "Well, with so many people dressed the way they are, I can imagine people not waiting to find a room. So what sort of rooms does this place have?
	haz "Well, with so many people dressed the way they are, I can imagine people not waiting to find a room. So what sort of rooms does this place have?

# game/talk.rpy:20
translate chinese talk_ver_9566fd1f:

    # ver "It's newly renovated under the new owner. It has several rooms, but I preferred the open space out here – plenty of dancing, drinking, and fun to be had here."
    ver "新老板刚翻修过这里。有几个独立房间，但我更喜欢这个开放空间——可以尽情跳舞、喝酒、找乐子。"

# game/talk.rpy:21
translate chinese talk_ver_23409465:

    # haz "Well, with so many people dressed the way they are, I can imagine people not waiting to find a room. So what sort of rooms does this place have?"
    haz "看大家穿成这样，估计没人会乖乖找房间。所以这里都有些什么主题房？"
